channel.title: TVU Player TV on your computer-Actual TV (ComCen...Fox etc.)
channel.description:
[url=http://www.twiceaday.net/TVU%20download.html]http://www.twiceaday.net/TVU%20download.html[/url]
Download the TVU player if you're simply going to watch, right now I'm watching Friends from my bedroom
This is mainly for people without TV's in their room :P Having one rather defeats the purpose
Some channels don't have as large of a signal, and of course there is some lag. But for the most part this is a great alternative to getting my lazy ass up and walking to the tv
Oh if you're extra nice, click an ad on the twiceaday page, I'll give you phr3e geep3z

item.title: TVU Player TV on your computer-Actual TV (ComCen...Fox etc.)
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

BBC kicks some ass though. I watched some old episodes of “Coupling” on demand the other day and I was the dude with the curly hair. I called my buddy over and he’s like, “You collect human ears too, Paul!” It was like I found my soulmate.

On TV.

Read full topic

[/quote]

BBC get tv licence, ITV3, Channel 4 and 5 get jack shit.[/quote]
i dont understand what you said, but yeah on my home tv i got
bbc 1+2 ITV and channel 4.

how pants, not even channel 5.

item.title: TVU Player TV on your computer-Actual TV (ComCen...Fox etc.)
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Thabest, post:9, topic:38763”][quote author=dark_child link=topic=54577.msg677732#msg677732 date=1166985150]

foxtel ftw, i got like something like over 300 channels :o

Same. Australian foxtel for the win!
[/quote]i used to have austar but now we got Foxtel yay

With comcast, you get ondemand, and like 600 something channels[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 04:54:16 AM[/size][hr][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=54577.msg675989#msg675989 date=1166950516]
damn american ads suck.
[/quote]

And what the fuck? Every one on these forums seems to hate Americans for some retarded reasons? Seriously, we’re people just like you. It doesn’t matter what country your from, were all still people. Where you come from has NOTHING to do with how smart you are, your sexuality, nothing! So tell me, right now, why is it “so bad” to be American?[/quote]
woah calm down i was saying i dont like the american ads…
and its not as if i like the ads i got here in england…
im sorry if you thought i was saying america sucks… but i really didnt say that lol.

Read full topic

damn american ads suck.

And what the fuck? Every one on these forums seems to hate Americans for some retarded reasons? Seriously, we’re people just like you. It doesn’t matter what country your from, were all still people. Where you come from has NOTHING to do with how smart you are, your sexuality, nothing! So tell me, right now, why is it “so bad” to be American?

Most people think you are all aragant, and stuck up. Which is loads of cases is true, americans going around telling people from other countries you can just blow them up for example.
[/quote]

In my entire life, I have not met one person like that. Any one that acts like that is retarded and should be shot.[/quote]

It’s the american sterotype … like the english stereotype is that we all have wierd teeth… well i beg to differ because most people have very normal teeth in england. and like the muslim stereotype is that they go around bombing for no reason … which is correct and they all do it.

http://www.twiceaday.net/TVU%20download.html

Download the TVU player if you’re simply going to watch, right now I’m watching Friends from my bedroom

This is mainly for people without TV’s in their room Having one rather defeats the purpose

Some channels don’t have as large of a signal, and of course there is some lag. But for the most part this is a great alternative to getting my lazy ass up and walking to the tv

Oh if you’re extra nice, click an ad on the twiceaday page, I’ll give you phr3e geep3z
